document.full_text: nato must broaden the range of targets it is bombing in libya or risk failing to remove muammar gaddafi from power, britain's most senior military officer was quoted as saying.
document.title: nato must step up pace in libya: british general
lines_and_colors: nato must broaden the range of targets it is bombing in libya or risk failing to remove muammar gaddafi from power, britain's most senior military officer was quoted as saying.
